metadata.name: HackTool - WinPwn Execution - ScriptBlock
metadata.comment: Detects scriptblock text keywords indicative of potential usge of the tool WinPwn. A tool for Windows and Active Directory reconnaissance and exploitation.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('offline_winpwn')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('winpwn ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('winpwn.exe')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('winpwn.ps1'))))

output.summary: Detects scriptblock text keywords indicative of potential usge of the tool WinPwn. A tool for Windows and Active Directory reconnaissance and exploitation.

metadata.objective: False positive: As the script block is a blob of text. False positive may occur with scripts that contain the keyword as a reference or simply use it for detection. References: https://github.com/S3cur3Th1sSh1t/WinPwn, https://www.publicnow.com/view/EB87DB49C654D9B63995FAD4C9DE3D3CC4F6C3ED?1671634841, https://reconshell.com/winpwn-tool-for-internal-windows-pentesting-and-ad-security/, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/4d6c4e8e23d465af7a2388620cfe3f8c76e16cf0/atomics/T1082/T1082.md, https://grep.app/search?q=winpwn&filter[repo][0]=redcanaryco/atomic-red-team
